headline: The Perfect Margarita
description: This margarita recipe uses fresh limes, white tequila, and high-quality triple sec. With the right ratios, you can easily make the perfect margarita!
name: The Perfect Margarita
recipeIngredient: 1 teaspoon coarse sea salt, or as needed
1 cup ice cubes, or as needed
1 fluid ounce freshly squeezed lime juice

recipeInstructions.text: Moisten the rim of a glass with a lime wedge. Sprinkle salt onto a plate. Lightly dip the moistened rim into the salt.
Place a large ice cube in the glass and freeze the prepared glass until ready to serve.
Fill a cocktail shaker with fresh ice. Add tequila, triple sec, and lime juice. Cover and shake vigorously until the outside of the shaker has frosted.
Strain margarita into the chilled glass and garnish with a slice of lime.

review.reviewBody: I used the same ratios, but modified the ingredients…used Espolon Reposado and 3/4 oz Grand Marnier and 3/4 oz Patron Citronge as the spirits…and added a bar spoon and a half of agave syrup…and of course, kept the same ratio of fresh lime juice. Filled the large shaker tin with ice and did a good 20 second shake, poured over a large chunk of ice in a double rocks glass; garnished with a charred lime wheel. The cocktail was tequila forward…as I drank it and the ice slowly melted, it balanced out nicely.
